metaTags.metaTitle: Cloudflare for Government | FedRAMP Moderate Authorized
metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare for Government is a suite of FedRAMP Authorized products that provide security, performance, and reliability for United States government agencies and organizations.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

psaBanner.text: Cloudflare for Government is authorized at FedRAMP Moderate Level to secure cloud products and services.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Federal Government
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protect. Connect. Accelerate.
relatedBlades.copy: Advance and secure your mission in the era of efficiency and AI.

streamPoster.description: Cloudflare for Federal Government - Video thumbnail

columnContent.title: Protect
columnContent.description:
__Mitigate risk with advanced cyber security capabilities__

- Mature Zero Trust architectures
- Stop disruptive cyber attacks
- Achieve continuous compliance

columnContent.title: Connect
columnContent.description:
__Enhance digital service performance and resilience__

- Deliver trustworthy digital services
- Integrate into existing ecosystems
- Optimize networks and data centers

columnContent.title: Accelerate
columnContent.description:
__Modernize faster and boost operational efficiency__

- Innovate faster with the power of AI
- Reduce costs and complexity
- Eradicate legacy technologies

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's unified global network is everywhere your users are
relatedBlades.copy: Spanning %{DataCenterCount} cities in %{CountryCount} countries and growing, Cloudflare is within %{OperationMilliseconds}ms of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of the world's Internet-connected population

columnContent.title: Speed and resilience
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's global network delivers the scale, performance, and availability that your mission deserves.

columnContent.title: Composable capabilities
columnContent.description: Our programmable architecture fits into your environment so you can benefit from Cloudflare without impeding your mission.

columnContent.title: Intuitive interface
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's simplified management interface speeds deployment and administration, making your IT teams more efficient and effective.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is FedRAMP Moderate authorized and committed to FedRAMP High
relatedBlades.copy: Our innovative approach to authorization delivers all of our capabilities in every FedRAMP processing location.

columnContent.title: Innovation everywhere
columnContent.description: Our single-platform approach ensures every innovation is available in every data center, including our FedRAMP processing locations.

columnContent.title: Continuous investment
columnContent.description: We're expanding our FedRAMP processing locations both within the U.S. and internationally to strengthen security and performance around the globe.

columnContent.title: Agility always
columnContent.description: We're deploying tomorrow's requirements today, like post-quantum cryptography, to secure your mission today —– and tomorrow.

relatedBlades.title: Imagine the power of global TIC running in an instant
relatedBlades.copy: By extending your TIC 3.0 capabilities around the world, Cloudflare's global network dramatically improves security, performance, and efficiency

columnContent.title: Erase your boundary
columnContent.description: Shift from a single network boundary to a modern, secure distributed architecture with the power of Cloudflare's global network.

columnContent.title: Uncomplicate your complexity
columnContent.description: Choose the security capabilities you need and snap into your existing TIC 3.0 architecture with confidence and speed.

columnContent.title: Unlock your efficiency
columnContent.description: Reduce costs by 50% or more when you adopt Cloudflare's efficient and extensive set of cloud-based TIC 3.0 security capabilities.

relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: IT'S EASY TO GET STARTED WITH CLOUDFLARE

columnContent.title: Secure DNS
columnContent.description: Gain a high-performance Domain Name System (DNS) service that defends against cyber attacks.

columnContent.title: Web app protection
columnContent.description: Block threats and zero-day exploits with an industry-leading web application firewall (WAF).

columnContent.title: DDoS prevention
columnContent.description: End the destructive distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks that impact availability and uptime.

columnContent.title: Application services
columnContent.description: Accelerate and scale web applications for world-class performance and reliability.

columnContent.title: Network services
columnContent.description: Connect users, offices, data centers, campuses, and apps with unparalleled efficiency.

columnContent.title: Secure network access
columnContent.description: Replace vulnerable VPNs with fast, reliable Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA).

content.value: Modern security innovations and trends: from AI to quantum.
Future-proof your security against emerging post-quantum threats.
Transform your tech stack while reducing costs: Modernizing apps with cloud application platforms.
A new model for securing public-facing network infrastructure: Defense in depth with cloud-based security.
